extension.description:
Sonarr (formerly NZBdrone) is a PVR for usenet and bittorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.sonarr: --------------------------
2.0.0 - Upgrade for Kodi v20: - Remove LE dependency - Upgrade `xbmc.python` dependency to 3.0.0 - Always use the multi-arch docker image
1.0.4 - Fix timezone bug
1.0.3 - Added aarch64 support
1.0.2 - Run as user nobody
1.0.1 - Unified addon for x86_64 and arm
1.0.0 -Initial release

extension.description:
A fork of Sonarr to work with movies à la Couchpotato.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.

extension.description:
API Support for your favorite torrent trackers
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.jackett: --------------------------------
2.0.0 - Initial release, copied from docker.linuxserver.transmission

extension.summary: Install add-ons from LinuxServer.io's docker repository
extension.description:
Download and install docker container add-ons from the LinuxServer.io repository. This is the extended repo.
Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.

Transmission is designed for easy, powerful use. Transmission has the features you want from a BitTorrent client: encryption, a web interface, peer exchange, magnet links, DHT, µTP, UPnP and NAT-PMP port forwarding, webseed support, watch directories, tracker editing, global and per-torrent speed limits, and more.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.transmission: --------------------------------
2.0.0 - Upgrade for Kodi v20: - Remove LE dependency - Upgrade `xbmc.python` dependency to 3.0.0 - Always use the multi-arch docker image
1.0.2 - Fix timezone bug
1.0.1 - Added aarch64 support
1.0.0 - Initial release

extension.description:
CouchPotato is an automatic NZB and torrent downloader. You can keep a movies I want list and it will search for NZBs/torrents of these movies every X hours. Once a movie is found, it will send it to SABnzbd or download the torrent to a specified directory.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.couchpotato: -------------------------------
2.0.0 - Upgrade for Kodi v20: - Remove LE dependency - Upgrade `xbmc.python` dependency to 3.0.0 - Always use the multi-arch docker image
1.0.4 - Fix timezone bug
1.0.3 - Added aarch64 support
1.0.2 - Run as user nobody
1.0.1 - Unified addon for x86_64 and arm
1.0.0 - Initial release

extension.description:
SABnzbd makes Usenet as simple and streamlined as possible by automating everything we can. All you have to do is add an .nzb. SABnzbd takes over from there, where it will be automatically downloaded, verified, repaired, extracted and filed away with zero human interaction.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.sabnzbd: ---------------------------
2.0.0 - Upgrade for Kodi v20: - Remove LE dependency - Upgrade `xbmc.python` dependency to 3.0.0 - Always use the multi-arch docker image
1.0.4 - Fix timezone bug
1.0.3 - Added aarch64 support
1.0.2 - Run as user nobody
1.0.1 - Unified addon for x86_64 and arm
1.0.0 - Initial release

extension.description:
NZBGet is a usenet downloader, written in C++ and designed with performance in mind to achieve maximum download speed by using very little system resources.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
Default user:pass are nzbget:tegbzn6789 (Change ASAP)
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.nzbget: --------------------------

1.0.4 - Fix timezone bug
1.0.3 - Added aarch support
1.0.2 - Change user to nobody
1.0.1 - Unified addon for x86_64 and arm
1.0.0 - Initial release
